title: Rep. Debbie Dingell’s Michigan Office Vandalized
sub_head: Most items targeted were memorabilia belonging to the Democratic congresswoman’s late husband, John Dingell
body:
Rep. Debbie Dingell’s Michigan office was broken into and vandalized, with the windows smashed and items inside destroyed, the Democratic congresswoman said Tuesday.
The motive for the incident remained unclear, a spokeswoman for Mrs. Dingell said. Most of the items targeted in the Dearborn, Mich., office were memorabilia belonging to Mrs. Dingell’s late husband, John Dingell, the longest-serving congressman in U.S. history.
